about_the_game: Quack Town Smack Down is a 3rd Person Arena shooter wrapped in a Goofy Rubber Duckky Toon Theme!  Hustle to pick up randomized abilities spread throughout each map to give you an advantage. The Pistol, Bubble Buckshot, Sniper Soaker, Kahuna Kreator, and Whirler all await to give you an edge over your fellow Dukkies in Free-for-All water combat! Soak the competition by utilizing Bounce pads, water abilities, and terrain. The Bubble Bathtub is the Dukkies home turf sporting colorful toys and open areas. Take it out back in the Sandbox with more verticality, tight spaces, and run-and-gun tactics.  Don't forget to customize your Dukkie's Hat, Eyes and the very rubber around their squeakers to make sure the lobby knows who the Smack Down King is!

Soak the competition by utilizing Bounce pads, water abilities, and terrain. The Bubble Bathtub is the Dukkies home turf sporting colorful toys and open areas. Take it out back in the Sandbox with more verticality, tight spaces, and run-and-gun tactics. name: Quacktown Smackdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible and 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible and 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Play as a Rubber Ducky in this 3rd Person Arena Shooter! Utilize squirt guns and water abilities and sink your opponents to become top duck of the tub! Battle it out in the Bubble Bath Battlefield or the Stormy Sandbox. Customize your ducky to make sure the lobby knows who's the Smack Down King!
